languages.text: "Меня заинтересовали музыкальные сервиторы. Их вам могли доставить только {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}алые жрецы{/g}, верно? Не подскажете для чего они посещали планету?"

traits.locale_text: "Боюсь, это работает немного не так, господин губернатор".

languages.text: "I was interested in the musical servitors. They could only have been brought to you by the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}crimson priests{/g}, correct? Can you tell me why they visited the planet?"
languages.original_text: "Меня заинтересовали музыкальные сервиторы. Их вам могли доставить только {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}алые жрецы{/g}, верно? Не подскажете для чего они посещали планету?"

traits.locale_text: "I was interested in the musical servitors. They could only have been brought to you by the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}crimson priests{/g}, correct? Can you tell me what they visited the planet for?""

"I was interested in another of Thassera's curiosities, the musical servitors. They could only be brought to you by the scarlet priests, right? Can you tell me who they were and what they visited the planet for?"

"I was interested in the musical servitors. They could only have been brought to you by the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}crimson priests{/g}, correct? Can you tell me why they visited the planet?"

"I was interested in the musical servitors. They could only have been brought to you by the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}crimson priests{/g}, correct? Can you tell me why they visited the planet?"

"I was interested in the musical servitors. They could only have been brought to you by the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}crimson priests{/g}, correct? Can you tell me why they visited the planet?"

"I was interested in the musical servitors. They could only have been brought to you by the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}crimson priests{/g}, correct? Can you tell me why they visited the planet?"

"I was interested in the musical servitors. They could only have been brought to you by the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}crimson priests{/g}, correct? Can you tell me what they visited the planet for?""

languages.text: “我其实对那些会演奏音乐的机仆很感兴趣。那些机仆肯定是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}红衣神甫{/g}给你带来的，没错吧？可以告诉我，那些神甫来这颗行星是为了什么吗？”
languages.original_text: "I was interested in the musical servitors. They could only have been brought to you by the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}crimson priests{/g}, correct? Can you tell me why they visited the planet?"

traits.locale_text: “我其实对那些会演奏音乐的机仆很感兴趣。那些机仆肯定是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}红衣神甫{/g}给你带来的，没错吧？可以告诉我，那些神甫来这颗行星是为了什么吗？”

languages.text: «Me interesan más los servidores musicales. Tuvieron que traerlos unos {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}sacerdotes de túnicas rojas{/g}, ¿me equivoco? ¿Puede decirme por qué visitaron su planeta?».
languages.original_text: "I was interested in the musical servitors. They could only have been brought to you by the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}crimson priests{/g}, correct? Can you tell me why they visited the planet?"

traits.locale_text: «Me interesan más los servidores musicales. Tuvieron que traerlos unos {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}sacerdotes de túnicas rojas{/g}, ¿me equivoco? ¿Puede decirme por qué visitaron su planeta?».

languages.text: "Müzik çalan hizmetörler ilgimi çekiyor. Bunları size ancak {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}kırmızı cübbeliler{/g} getirmiş olabilir, doğru mudur? Bu şahısların gezegeni ne amaçla ziyaret ettiklerini söyleyebilir misiniz?"
languages.original_text: "I was interested in the musical servitors. They could only have been brought to you by the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}crimson priests{/g}, correct? Can you tell me why they visited the planet?"

traits.locale_text: "Müzik çalan hizmetörler ilgimi çekiyor. Bunları size ancak {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}kırmızı cübbeliler{/g} getirmiş olabilir, doğru mudur? Bu şahısların gezegeni ne amaçla ziyaret ettiklerini söyleyebilir misiniz?"

languages.text: 「音楽のサーヴィターだに興味があったんだけど。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}深紅の司祭{/g}によって、お前のところに持ってこられるだけだろう、合っているか？彼らが何の目的で惑星を訪れたか知っているか？」
languages.original_text: "I was interested in the musical servitors. They could only have been brought to you by the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}crimson priests{/g}, correct? Can you tell me why they visited the planet?"

traits.locale_text: 「別のタッセーラの珍しいものに興味があったんだけど、音楽のサーヴィターだ。深紅の司祭によって、お前のところに持ってこられるだけだろう、合っているか？彼らが何者で何の目的で惑星を訪れたか知っているか？」

languages.text: « Je m'intéresse aux servitors musicaux. Ils vous viennent du {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}clergé écarlate{/g}, je me trompe ? Pouvez-vous me dire pourquoi ils se sont rendus sur la planète ? »
languages.original_text: "I was interested in the musical servitors. They could only have been brought to you by the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}crimson priests{/g}, correct? Can you tell me why they visited the planet?"

traits.locale_text: « Je m'intéresse aux servitors musicaux. Ils vous viennent du {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}clergé écarlate{/g}, je me trompe ? Pouvez-vous me dire pourquoi ils se sont rendus sur la planète ? »

languages.text: "Ich war an den Musikservitoren interessiert. Die können Euch doch nur die {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}roten Priester{/g} gebracht haben, korrekt? Könnt Ihr mir sagen, weshalb sie den Planeten besucht haben?"
languages.original_text: "I was interested in the musical servitors. They could only have been brought to you by the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}crimson priests{/g}, correct? Can you tell me why they visited the planet?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich war an den Musikservitoren interessiert. Die können Euch doch nur die roten Priester gebracht haben, korrekt? Könnt Ihr mir sagen, wer sie waren und weshalb sie den Planeten besucht haben?" Die können Euch doch nur die {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}roten Priester{/g} gebracht haben, korrekt? Könnt Ihr mir sagen, weshalb sie den Planeten besucht haben?"
